title: What advantages to your business would defining an exemplary customer experience bring you? - Quora

response.answer_text: All the advantages of good UX, including customer loyalty, increased return, more attention to brand, increased sales (if ecommerce), better word of mouth advertising, preference over competition, focus on real problem causes (not blaming the UI), etc. However, defining an (as in one) experience may target only some users - the difficulty is that there needs to be exemplary experiences across all the user types targeted.
